To get back its mojo, Google may be returning to its startup roots. A lot of the growth of the company used to be driven by innovation, said Yun Kim, an analyst at investment firm Gleacher& Co.`` Having someone with the very strong products background that Larry Page has could Sergey Bring some innovation back to Google.'' Allen Iverson had 26 points, nine assists, and combined with Linas Kleiza , JR Smith and Eduardo Nájera on a 14-1 fourth-quarter spurt that Carrie Underwoodd the Nuggets to a 125-114 victory over the New Jersey Nets on Friday night. We've been struggling, losing two on the road and we just wanted to do anything to get a win, Allen Iverson said after scoring 21 second-half points to help the Nuggets break a two-game losing streak. The use of legitimate force is there and we will say that it is the ultimate resort, the very last resort if everything else has failed, he added. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better.`` Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added:`` For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune.''
